name: City with no people
description:
This is a submission for the 2019 SubQ jam. You can check out other entries here:  https://itch.io/jam/subqjam-2019/entries

Part interactive meditation, part conversation with myself, part love letter to the city I live in.

8 images, 926 words, 9 "conclusions" to play through.

This interactive piece is some thoughts about what a post-humanity world would be, and what that would mean.

Definitely an out there response to the SubQ jam brief, but given the constraints it just felt right. 

I have had some hiccups with  chapbook for this game - hoping the issues won't affect anyone's experience. If possible refrain from using the "Restart" button in the right hand corner. (at the end of each conclusion, a restart button will pop up in text.
